name: Odyssey
description:
Odyssey is a mission-driven technology company that partners with state agencies to help families access high-quality K-12 education. Odyssey equips states with the tools to manage all aspects of school choice administration in a single, easy-to-use platform. To date, we have partnered with seven state agencies to administer ESAs, microgrant, and voucher
Programs. 

For the 2025-2026 school year, Odyssey is projected to support 100,000+ students in accessing more than $800 million of state funding.
